points: Skilled at architecting and implementing APIs, applications, and libraries

items.title: Owner

items.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Worked on machine-learning audience segment analysis project.
Worked with enormous amounts of data, implementing performant algorithms and analytics with it.
Worked on many internal libraries that benefit most of our products.
Helped develop an API used by all projects within the company, and exposed to many clients.
Created and maintained an app platform, used to build native, mobile, and web apps for restaurants.
Wrote unit tests aimed at complete code coverage.
Worked with a team building systems and processes used for data analytics.
Contributed to open-source tools, including those created in-house.
Operated in an Agile ecosystem, with daily Scrum meetings and biweekly sprints.
Helped develop dashboard for visualizing and altering data, used both internally and by clients.
Worked on highly-customized mobile and web apps for restaurants.
